item.title: By: Jonathan Shock
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Shock
item.description: If we have (1+a)^b, we can write this is (a(1+1/a))^b, and we know that if we have (pq)^r, this is p^rq^r, so therefore (a(1+1/a))^b=a^b(1+1/a)^b. In this case a is n and b is 3. Does that help?
